original_text: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
korean_text: 시온에 대하여 말하기를 이 사람, 저 사람이 거기서 났다고 말하리니 지존자가 친히 시온을 세우리라 하는도다

sentences.original_text: And of Zion it shall be said
This and that man was born in her
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람과 저 사람이 그곳에서 났다

sentences.original_text: and the highest himself shall establish her
